items.name: 12-Gauge Buckshot Shell
items.description: 12-Gauge Buckshot Shell, the basic ammunition used by Shotguns . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts, this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered.

items.name: 12-Gauge CHAC Shell
items.description: 12-Gauge CHAC Shell is an advanced purchaseable buckshot ammunition that does up to 450 damage. It pairs well with the CHAC "Boomstick" Shotgun that can also be purchased from the Workshop .

items.name: 12-Gauge CHAC Shell Box
items.description: The 12-Gauge CHAC Shell Box provides 25 rounds of the 12-Gauge CHAC Shell that works with any Shotgun and pairs well with the CHAC "Boomstick" Shotgun that can also be purchased from the Workshop .

items.name: 12-Gauge Cold Steel Shell
items.description: 12-Gauge Cold Steel Shell is a Cold Steel variant of ammunition for Shotguns . It inflicts extra Frost damage and a chance to slow the target and weaken their attacks.

items.name: 12-Gauge Explosive Shell
items.description: 12-Gauge Explosive Shells are used by Shotguns . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Damages area around target. Caution when using this ammunition is advised. 12-Gauge Explosive Shells have 6 pellets per shell.

items.name: 12-Gauge Miasmic Shell
items.description: 12-Gauge Miasmic Shell, a Miasmic variant of ammunition used by Shotguns .

items.name: 12-Gauge Obsidian Shell
items.description: 12-Gauge Obsidian Shells are a variant of 12-Gauge Buckshot Shells that deal fire damage on hit and have a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 12-Gauge Obsidian Shells can decimate Fauna that have a weakness to fire, especially when the 'Burning' modifier occurs. A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewed here .

items.name: 12.7mm CHAC Ammo Box
items.description: The 12.7mm CHAC Ammo Box provides 25 12.7mm CHAC Rounds of Sniper Ammunition that works with the Anti-materiel Rifle .

items.name: 12.7mm CHAC Explosive Ammo Box
items.description: The 12.7mm CHAC Explosive Ammo Box provides 25 12.7mm CHAC Explosive Rounds of Sniper Ammunition that works with the Anti-materiel Rifle .

items.name: 12.7mm CHAC Explosive Round
items.description: 12.7mm CHAC Explosive Round is a type of explosive Sniper Ammunition for the Anti-materiel Rifle that does 500 projectile damage and 400 explosive damage.

items.name: 12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Ammo Box
items.description: The 12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Ammo Box provides 25 12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Rounds of Sniper Ammunition that works with the Anti-materiel Rifle .

items.name: 12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Round
items.description: 12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Round is a type of explosive Sniper Ammunition for the Anti-materiel Rifle that does 500 projectile damage and +25% fire damage.

items.name: 12.7mm CHAC Round
items.description: 12.7mm CHAC Round is a type of Sniper Ammunition for the Anti-materiel Rifle that does 600 damage.

items.name: 5.56mm Armor Piercing Round
items.description: 5.56mm Armor Piercing Round is used by the Assault Rifle .

items.name: 5.56mm Cold Steel Round
items.description: 5.56mm Cold Steel Round is a Cold Steel variant of ammunition for the Assault Rifle . It inflicts extra Frost damage and a chance to slow the target and weaken their attacks.

items.name: 5.56mm Explosive Round
items.description: The 5.56mm Explosive Round is used by the Assault Rifle . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Damages area around target. Caution when using this ammunition is advised.

items.name: 5.56mm Incendiary Round
items.description: The 5.56mm Incendiary Rounds are used in the fully-automatic Tier 4 Assault Rifle . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered.

items.name: 5.56mm Miasmic Round
items.description: 5.56mm Miasmic Round, a Miasmic variant of ammunition used by the Assault Rifle .

items.name: 5.56mm Obsidian Round
items.description: 5.56mm Obsidian Rounds are an alternative to 5.56mm Incendiary Rounds that deal fire damage on hit and has a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 5.56mm Obsidian Rounds excel when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire, dealing more damage than 5.56mm Rounds . A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewed here .

items.name: 5.56mm Round
items.description: The 5.56mm Rounds are used in the fully-automatic Tier 4 Assault Rifle . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered.

items.name: 7.62mm Armor Piercing Round
items.description: 7.62mm Armor Piercing Rounds are used by the Bolt Action Rifle and the Hunting Rifle . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Unlike standard ammunition, the 7.62mm Armor Piercing Round can pierce hardened points and will deal 250 damage, similar to hitting a non-hardened point.

items.name: 7.62mm CHAC Ammo Box
items.description: The 7.62mm CHAC Ammo Box provides 25 7.62mm CHAC Rounds of Rifle Ammunition that works with Rifles .

items.name: 7.62mm Cold Steel Round
items.description: 7.62mm Cold Steel Round is a Cold Steel variant of ammunition for Rifles . It inflicts extra Frost damage and a chance to slow the target and weaken their attacks.

items.name: 7.62mm Explosive Round
items.description: 7.62mm Explosive Rounds are used by the Bolt Action Rifle and the Hunting Rifle . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Damages area around target. Caution when using this ammunition is advised.

items.name: 7.62mm Incendiary Round
items.description: 7.62mm Incendiary Rounds are used by the Bolt Action Rifle / Hunting Rifle . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Hitting a target will set it ablaze, dealing damage for approximately 20 seconds. Deals 8-11 damage a second to normal targets, and 16-22 damage a second to targets that are weak to fire. A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewed here (TBA - no information yet).

items.name: 7.62mm Miasmic Round
items.description: 7.62mm Miasmic Round, a Miasmic variant of ammunition used by Rifles .

items.name: 7.62mm Obsidian Round
items.description: 7.62mm Obsidian Rounds are an alternative to 7.62mm Incendiary Rounds that deals fire damage on hit and has a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 7.62mm Obsidian Rounds excel when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire, dealing more damage than 7.62mm Rounds . A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewed here .

items.name: 9mm Armor Piercing Round
items.description: 9mm Armor Piercing Rounds are used by the Pistol . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Unlike standard ammunition, the 9mm Armor Piercing Round can pierce hardened points and will deal 100 damage, similar to hitting a non-hardened point.

items.name: 9mm CHAC Ammo
items.description: 9mm CHAC Ammo is an advanced pistol ammunition that does 200 damage.

items.name: 9mm CHAC Ammo Box
items.description: The 9mm CHAC Ammo Box provides 25 rounds of 9mm CHAC Ammo that works with any Pistol and pairs well with the CHAC "Sentinel" Pistol that can also be purchased from the Workshop .

items.name: 9mm Cold Steel Round
items.description: 9mm Cold Steel Round is a Cold Steel variant of ammunition for Pistols . It inflicts extra Frost damage and a chance to slow the target and weaken their attacks.

items.name: 9mm Explosive Round
items.description: 9mm Explosive Rounds are used by the Pistol . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Damages area around target. Caution when using this ammunition is advised.

items.name: 9mm Incendiary Round
items.description: 9mm Incendiary Rounds are used by the Pistol . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Hitting a target will set it ablaze, dealing damage for approximately 20 seconds. Deals 8-11 damage a second to normal targets, and 16-22 damage a second to targets that are weak to fire. A list of Fauna that are weak to fire can be viewed here .

items.name: 9mm Miasmic Round
items.description: 9mm Miasmic Round, a Miasmic variant of ammunition used by Pistols .

items.name: 9mm Obsidian Round
items.description: 9mm Obsidian Rounds are an alternative to 9mm Incendiary Rounds that deals fire damage on hit and has a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 9mm Obsidian Rounds excel when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire, dealing more damage than 9mm Rounds . A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewed here .

items.name: 9mm Round
items.description: The basic ammunition used by the Pistols . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. With the talent Pistol Proficiency , Prospectors can craft this ammo at a -25% reduced resource cost. Also, with the talent Freebies , Prospectors have a 5% chance to craft double ammo. The ability to craft double ammo works in tandem, on a successful proc chance, with the reduced resource cost recipe netting a total of six extra rounds of ammunition.

items.name: Aluminium Arrow
items.description: The Aluminium Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Ammo Casing
items.description: The Ammo Casing is a vital component used in the crafting of 9mm Rounds and 7.62mm Rounds .

items.name: Black Wolf Arrow
items.description: The Black Wolf Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 10.

items.name: Bone Arrow
items.description: The Bone Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

items.name: Carbon Arrow
items.description: The Carbon Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Carbon Fibre Round Shield
items.description: The Carbon Fibre Round Shield is crafted at the Forge/Foundry with the following resources:

items.name: Carved Wood Narrow Wardrobe
items.description: Carved Wood Narrow Wardrobe is a decorative narrow wardrobe with 10 inventory slots. It has two build variants available by selecting 'R' when deploying.

items.name: Caveworm Arrow
items.description: The Caveworm Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Similar to the Poison Arrow , these are helpful in a 'fire and flee' situation. Firing multiple arrows will continue to stack the Poisoned debuff, dealing damage over time.

items.name: Cold Steel Arrow
items.description: The Cold Steel Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow , introduced in Chapter - New Frontier . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Columbian Mammoth Trophy
items.description: Columbian Mammoth Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

items.name: Columbian Mammoth Vestige
items.description: Columbian Mammoth Vestiges are used at the Trophy Bench to create a Columbian Mammoth Trophy , which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary .

items.name: Composite Arrow
items.description: The Composite Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Crude Ammo
items.description: Crude Ammo is a crude, low-tech ammunition that works with all categories of Pistols .

items.name: Decorative Shell
items.description: The Decorative Shell is an item unlocked by completing the Fracture mission. There are two varieties of pottery selectable by 'R'.

items.name: Fire Arrow
items.description: Want to turn that forest filled with bears into an inferno? The fire arrow is your friend. Need a light at the top of that cave? Fire arrow. While not as bright as the Flare Arrow , it will continue burning upon impact. Similar to the Poison Arrow , the Fire Arrow is a DOT upgrade to the Stone Arrow , which is helpful when in a 'fire and flee' situation. These arrows cannot be recovered once fired.

items.name: Flare Arrow
items.description: Flare Arrows are used to light up dark areas/cave roofs and can be shot high into the air to illuminate the darkness or to signal fellow Prospectors from a distance. These arrows cannot be recovered once fired.

items.name: Flint Arrow
items.description: The Flint Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Inaris "Aruda" Arrow
items.description: The Inaris "Aruda" Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

items.name: Inaris "Aruda" Arrow Bundle
items.description: Consuming the Inaris "Aruda" Arrow Bundle will add 25x Inaris "Aruda" Arrow s to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed arrow bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Arrow bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

items.name: Inaris "Biana" Arrow
items.description: The Inaris "Biana" Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. The elemental damage dealt by these arrows are not effected by Bow talents.

items.name: Inaris "Biana" Arrow Bundle
items.description: Consuming the Inaris "Biana" Arrow Bundle will add 25x Inaris "Biana" Arrow s to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a Prospect. Consumed arrow bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Arrow bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Consumed arrow bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Arrow bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

items.name: Larkwell Martinez Arrow
items.description: The Larkwell Martinez Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

items.name: Larkwell Martinez Ballistic Arrow
items.description: The Larkwell Martinez Ballistic Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Unlike bolts and javelins, they cannot be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Caution when using this ammunition is advised.

items.name: Larkwell Martinez Bleed Arrow
items.description: The Larkwell Martinez Bleed Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

items.name: MXC Flange Arrow
items.description: The MXC Flange Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

items.name: MXC Flange Arrow Bundle
items.description: Consuming the bundle will add 5x MXC Flange Arrow to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed arrow bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Arrow bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

items.name: MXC Nerve Arrow

Consumed arrow bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Arrow bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

items.name: Mammoth Tusk
items.description: Mammoth Tusks are a resource obtained from the Woolly Mammoth / Columbian Mammoth . Requires an Iron Knife or better to skin and harvest the downed beast.

items.name: Miasmic Arrow
items.description: The Miasmic Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow , requiring Distilled Miasmic Coating introduced on the Prometheus map.

items.name: Narrow Barrel Attachment
items.description: Narrow Barrel Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech.

items.name: Obsidian Arrow
items.description: The Obsidian Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Poison Arrow
items.description: The Poison Arrow is a damage over time upgrade to the Stone Arrow , which is helpful when in a 'fire and flee' situation. DOT effect stacks.

items.name: Round Rustic Sign
items.description: A Round Rustic Sign made of wood.

items.name: Rustic Narrow Wardrobe
items.description: The Rustic Narrow Wardrobe smaller wardrobe but still has 10 slot capacity and two variations selectable by holding R.

items.name: Sandworm Arrow
items.description: An upgrade to the Poison Arrow these are helpful in a 'fire and flee' situation. Firing multiple arrows will continue to stack the Wound debuff, decreasing health regeneration of the target by 80%.

items.name: Shengong "Wenhe" Arrow
items.description: The Shengong "Wenhe" Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

items.name: Shengong "Wenhe" Arrow Bundle
items.description: Consuming the Shengong "Wenhe" Arrow Bundle will add 25x Shengong "Wenhe" Arrows to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed arrow bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Arrow bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
